about_the_game:
The Fallen Seeds Artbook Extra expands the game’s world, offering you early concepts in a different style, characters not included in the first part of the game, fan art, promo art, and several illustrations created specifically for this artbook. This collection provides a unique opportunity to see the development and expansion of the Fallen Seeds universe.

Like the main artbook, the Artbook Extra DLC includes the artbook itself available in PDF format and a set of PNG images that can be used as desktop wallpapers.

By purchasing this artbook, you not only get a behind-the-scenes look at the game’s creation but also support the developers, helping them continue working on new projects.

Key Features:

  • Early concepts in a different style
  • Characters not included in the first part of the game
  • Fan art and promo art
  • Special illustrations created for the artbook
  • A set of PNG images for use as desktop wallpapers
  • All illustrations created by the project artist Alice Makoveeva

The Fallen Seeds Artbook Extra expands the game’s world, offering you early concepts in a different style, characters not included in the first part of the game, fan art, promo art, and several illustrations created specifically for this artbook. This collection provides a unique opportunity to see the development and expansion of the Fallen Seeds universe.

Like the main artbook, the Artbook Extra DLC includes the artbook itself available in PDF format and a set of PNG images that can be used as desktop wallpapers.

By purchasing this artbook, you not only get a behind-the-scenes look at the game’s creation but also support the developers, helping them continue working on new projects.

Key Features:

  • Early concepts in a different style

  • Fan art and promo art
  • Special illustrations created for the artbook
